select * from video where video.video_main_id = #{video_main_id} and verify_status='审核中' order by episode_id ASC
select * from video where video.video_main_id = #{video_main_id} and verify_status='未通过' order by episode_id ASC
select label.label_id, label.label_name from v_label left join label on v_label.label_id = label.label_id where v_label.video_main_id = #{video_main_id}

select video_main.* from video_main where video_main.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and (video_main.video_main_title like #{content} or video_main.summary like #{content}) ORDER BY video_main.video_date DESC limit #{pageInfo.pageNum},#{pageInfo.pageSize};
select count(*) from video_main where video_main.teacher_id = #{teacherId} and (video_main.video_main_title like #{content} or video_main.summary like #{content});
mapper.update: update video_main set main_page = #{mainPage},edit_time = #{editTime} where video_main_id = #{videoMainId};
update video_main set video_main_title = #{videoMainTitle},summary = #{summary},edit_time = #{editTime} where video_main_id = #{videoMainId};
update video set video_title = #{videoTitle},episode_id = #{episodeId} where video_id = #{videoId};
update video_main set edit_time = #{editTime} where video_main_id IN (select video.video_main_id from video where video_id = #{videoId});
mapper.select: select video_main.* from video_main where video_main.school_id in (select users.school_id from users where users.user_id = #{userId}) AND (video_main.verify_status = #{verifyStatus} OR (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM video WHERE video.`video_main_id` = video_main.`video_main_id` AND video.`verify_status` = #{verifyStatus}) > 0) ORDER BY video_main.edit_time ASC limit #{pageInfo.pageNum},#{pageInfo.pageSize};

select count(*) from video_main where video_main.school_id in (select users.school_id from users where users.user_id = #{userId}) AND (video_main.verify_status = #{verifyStatus} OR (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM video WHERE video.`video_main_id` = video_main.`video_main_id` AND video.`verify_status` = #{verifyStatus}) > 0);
mapper.update: update video_main set verify_status = #{verifyStatus} where video_main_id = #{videoMainId};
